import React, { Component } from "react"; import "./WorkExperience.css"; import Fade from "react-reveal/Fade"; import Coding from "../../assets/images/experience-page/coding.png"; import dc from "../../assets/images/experience-page/dc.png"; export class WorkExperience extends Component { render() { return (
Work Experience

Work Experience

  • Digital Cloudies

    Full Stack Developer
    April' 1 2024 - Current

    {" "} Gained critical expertise and hands-on experience in translating theoretical principles into practical solutions for real-world issues.

); } } export default WorkExperience;
